subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
Soccer
Basketball
lead_paragraph: It is less surprising that LeBron James returned to Cleveland and thumped the Cavaliers than it is that Russia and Qatar bested England and the U.S. But it stings just the same.
snippet: It is less surprising that LeBron James returned to Cleveland and thumped the Cavaliers than it is that Russia and Qatar bested England and the U.S. But it stings just the same.
